title: Thelma and Louise (1991) Susan Sarandon (Opt. MULTISUBS)
description:
<a href="http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103074/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103074/</a>

a.k.a.
Thelma & Louise (1991)
Thelma Louise (1991)
Thelma  Louise (1991)
Thelma and Louise (1991)
Thelma & Louise*
Thelma Louise*
Thelma  Louise*

With: Geena Davis, Brad Pitt, Michael Madsen and Harvey Keitel.

Optional subtitles in separate idx/sub files: (Work in Windows Media Player etc.): Danish, Dutch, English for the hearing impaired, English (normal), Finnish, French, German, Italian, Norwegian, Portuguese, Spanish, Swedish.

This Oscar-winning, classic road trip may be regarded as the ultimate journey to women's liberation. Also known as the breakthrough for Brad Pitt (then 26) playing the sexy hustler.

Great soundtrack: Be prepared for a reencounter with "The Ballad Of Lucy Jordan" sung by Marianne Faithfull (starts 1h27m), and "Part Of You, Part Of Me" with Glenn Frey (end texts). Note that English subtitles for the hearing impaired displays text (in English) for all songs.
Soundtrack listing at http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0103074/soundtrack

Widescreen DVDrip XviD 2-pass 704x288, great stereo sound AC3.
Runs well in both my standalone DivX players.
